features.title: PaymentSheet
description: [ADDED]5676 Added AddressLauncher, an activity that collects local and international addresses for your customers.

[ADDED]5769 Added PaymentSheet.Configuration.allowsPaymentMethodsRequiringShippingAddress. Previously, to allow payment methods that require a shipping address (e.g. Afterpay and Affirm) in PaymentSheet, you attached a shipping address to the PaymentIntent before initializing PaymentSheet. Now, you can instead set this property to true and set PaymentSheet.Configuration.shippingDetails or PaymentSheet.FlowController.shippingDetails whenever your customer’s shipping address becomes available. The shipping address will be attached to the PaymentIntent when the customer completes the checkout.
